overview: Kent Lasershaft is a superhero for the ages. A defender of the weak and hero of the innocent. Heâ€™s also the creation of Kent Edwards, a quiet nerd who finds solace in his fantasy creation: the world of Cosmic Adventures! But what Kent does not realize is that the biggest threat to his fantasy world is not his fictitious villains, but rather, the hubris of its own creator.
title: Cosmic Adventures
